title: Markets, Apple, Washington, And ETFs (Podcast)
itunes:title: Markets, Apple, Washington, And ETFs (Podcast)
description:
Phil Orlando, Chief Equity strategist at Federated Hermes, discusses markets and investing. Robert Stimpson, CIO and Portfolio Manager for Oak Associates Funds, discusses markets and investing strategies. Anurag Rana, Senior Software and IT Services Analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses Apple kicking off its four-part bond sale to fund buybacks and dividends. Emily Wilkins, DC reporter at Bloomberg News, discusses Nancy Pelosi potentially visiting Taiwan and the implications for the US. Stephanie Pierce, CEO of Dreyfus, Mellon & ETFs at BNY Mellon Investment Management, talks about the firm’s sponsored ETF offering as well as the index and money markets business. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
